x_snc_team_action_items.description:
Pradeep is a perfectionist and whatever task he is put in, he always tries to get the best of it and goes beyond by questioning the status quo to get the visual of the big picture. He is a self-driven, passionate, hardworking and well-balanced person. Building the solution for Partner Finder SEO problem on the platform was an example of his capability. He is driving key projects like Customer Health Phase-3, QPP JP4 and upgrade. He is also innovation-driven and likes to automate wherever possible. Revamped the RcR PHP solution by porting it into NODEJS to make the easy maintenance of the tool is one such example. He is a pillar for the IT Global Services in IDC and is playing and will need him to continue to play this critical role in the upcoming assignments down the line.
Key projects 1. Partner Finder - Support SEO using URLs and meta tags despite OOTB constraints. Greatly appreciated 2. Resource WorkBench User Interface 3. GSDC Work Management Bus 4. Designed and implemented Capacity planning for GSDC application single-handedly 5. Enhance UX by overriding OOTB platform image upload for Partner Portal - Directory page 6. Customer health project phase 3 7. Jakarta upgrade & SE
Innovation/Others 1. Rapid Code Review Tool v2.0 2. Easy Task
